files.content: --- /** * @component Breadcrumb * @title Breadcrumb * @description A navigation path showing the user's location in the site hierarchy with links to parent pages. * @figmaUrl https://www.figma.com/design/koxai7zw5vIuBzuVxe5T2l/bejamas-ui?node-id=2543-3603&t=YFStJ3V8fXEO8QD8-4 * * @preview * * * * Home * * Docs * * Page * * * * @usage * * ```astro nocollapse * --- * import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbList, BreadcrumbItem, BreadcrumbSeparator } from '@bejamas/ui/components/breadcrumb'; * --- * * * * Home * * Page * * * ``` * * @examples * * ### Custom separator * * * * Home * * * * Docs * * * * Page * * */ import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"; import type { HTMLAttributes, HTMLTag } from "astro/types"; type Props = { as?: HTMLTag; class?: string; } & HTMLAttributes<"nav">; const { as: Tag = "nav", class: className = "", ...rest } = Astro.props as Props; ---
